definitions.definition: The state of being sexually attracted primarily or exclusively to persons of the same sex, sometimes ( potentially offensive ) restricted to same-sex attraction between males.
Sexual activity with a person of the same sex, sometimes ( potentially offensive ) restricted to same-sex sex between males.

main_definition: The state of being sexually attracted primarily or exclusively to persons of the same sex, sometimes ( potentially offensive ) restricted to same-sex attraction between males.
secondary_definitions: Sexual activity with a person of the same sex, sometimes ( potentially offensive ) restricted to same-sex sex between males.
